claimtext: After the IDO ends, you can claim 50% of the purchased quantity within 24h. The remaining 50% will be released on average in the next 3 months.
idosuccesstext: Congratulations on successfully participating in Orich IDO. After the IDO ends, you can claim 50% of the purchased quantity within 24 hours. The remaining 50% will be released on average in the next 3 months.
